item.description:
Update: 03/08/2013 -- Tickets have been purchased.

For this Meet-up we will return to the Gamm Theater for "The Real Thing." Here is the description on the Gamm's website:

"This multi-award winning play (Evening Standard, New York Drama Critics' and Tony awards) by the author of such masterworks as Rock 'n' Roll, Arcadia, and Rosencrantz and Guildenstern are Dead combines the playwright's brilliant wordplay and wit with poignant insights about the nature and mystery of love, commitment and authenticity. Charlotte, an actress, is appearing in a play about marriage written by her cerebral playwright husband, Henry (Tony Estrella). Max, her leading man, is also married to an actress, Annie. Both marriages are on the verge of a breakdown because Henry and Annie have fallen in love. But there's a question not even Henry can answer: Is it the real thing?"

Ticket Information

Tickets are $50.25 (including Gamm's Convenience Charge and Paypal's transaction fee.)  The breakdown is as follows: Ticket price: $45.00; GAMM Convenience Charge: $3.50; Paypal transaction fee: $1.75.

Seating is reserved. Therefore, I will purchase all tickets for the group.  See the payment options below.

RSVPs for this Meetup will close on Thursday, March 7th. I will purchase the tickets on the 8th.

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet at the Gamm Theater promptly at 7:30 PM. I will also provide my cell number in case you need to reach me.

Payment Options

When you RSVP, there will be a question asking how you wish to pay for your ticket.  Please note that I must have payment prior to 03/07/13 so I can purchase our tickets.  I'm open to any option other than a personal check.  Here are my preferred choices:

1) Provide your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  You may use that invoice to pay by credit card or direct bank debit.  Note that you do NOT need a Paypal account to pay by credit card.  This is the preferred option and was used successfully for the past two seasons.

2) I can provide my mailing address and you can send me a cashiers check or money order.  (No personal checks.)  Remember, though, that I need it before 03/07/13.

Refund Policy

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if you change your RSVP to "NO" on or before 03/07/13.

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if the play is sold out and we are unable to get tickets.

Once tickets are purchased on 03/08/13, no refunds will be provided.  You will be responsible for the disposal of your ticket if you're unable to attend.
item.name: The Real Thing
